body_html: The prebuilt tensorflow binaries only support CUDA 9.0. If you want to use 9.1, you'll have to build tensorflow from source. I'd recommend just using CUDA 9.0 though, since it's easier and you won't notice any functional differences :).
body_text: The prebuilt tensorflow binaries only support CUDA 9.0. If you want to use 9.1, you'll have to build tensorflow from source. I'd recommend just using CUDA 9.0 though, since it's easier and you won't notice any functional differences :).
body: The prebuilt tensorflow binaries only support CUDA 9.0. If you want to use 9.1, you'll have to build tensorflow from source. I'd recommend just using CUDA 9.0 though, since it's easier and you won't notice any functional differences :).
